body.p: This samples demonstrates how to enable a WS-Transfer (xfer) support for an arbitrary service.
The xfer-sample is located in the samples directory which is in the WSO2AppServer root directory.
To build the samples you need the Apache Ant build tool

ol.pre: e.g. In MS Windows cd C:\wso2appserver-x.x.x\samples\Xfer or in Linux cd wso2appserver-x.x.x/samples/Xfer

body.p: To enable WS-Transfer support for samples services, follow the following steps
body.ol:
Log in to AppServer Console
Click on the List link in the Manage\services section on the left hand side panel.
You will see CustomerService service has been already deployed.
Click on the CustomerService link in deployed services table(in Service Groups)
Click on the Module link in service management page.
Select wso2xfer from the drop down list and click the engage button

ol.li: Switch to xfer sample directory in terminal
Run run-client.bat (or run-client.sh if you are in Linux)
The results will be printed to the console.
